title: Riot 10th Birthday
body: Well, I don't know if this is a bug or something but when the 10th birthday of Riot came along with the skin and icon for the participants I was so hype. I played games and followed all of the instructions but I haven't recieved neither the skin nor the icon differently from my smurf account where I did. I was wondering if someone can replay to my problem and solve it for me. Thank You!

replies.body: Eligible players should have received their anniversary gifts by now.  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us so we can take a closer look to find what's going on.  We'll help individually with your case!
